content: skill level advanced technique double filet crochet interlocking filet crochet overlay mosaic crochet pattern in the round and row by row bottom to top materials ● you require two contrasting yarn colors one for the main background colour colour a and one contrast pattern colour colour b i used scheepjes bloom cotton yarn aran weight 406 tulip and 404 lilac 1 ball is 50g/80 meters ● 4 mm hook interlocking filet crochet 3 75 mm mosaic crochet this is a dense project increase the hook size as needed for a drapey afghan ● stitch markers scissors tape measure size / yardage interlocking filet crochet the size of the potholder is approximately 18x18 cm 7″x7″ to achieve 7″x7″ the end of round 3a should be approximately 2 square overlay mosaic crochet 20 by 20 cm app 7 ¾″ by 7 ¾″ the pattern contains the charts and right-handed instructions upd september 24 2021 added russian translation теперь описание есть на русском языке вяжите с удовольствием
